name: Nice Dice Twice!!
description:
No one knows for sure what lies behind the black doors of deep cosmos. Some say there are strange dimensions where reality is warped and the rules that hold space and time become more... accessible.

Either way, you will know.

Kill space bugs

Insatiable creatures, dwellers of the unrandom zone. They know you are an anomaly and won't cease until they correct it. Take them all out every round.

Defy your fate

Each round your stats are randomised. Improve your dice by surviving wave after wave to increase your chances of getting a good roll.

Change your luck

But you are not completely alone. Some enemies will drop cards that you can use to modify your dice and rolls. There is no limit to the number of cards you can use and no maximum value. Smash your luck by smashing your limits and smash the unrandom critters with it.

And do it again.

Improve your dice. Get better rolls. Use card after card and break the rules. Survive wave after wave becoming stronger after each one... or trust a bad roll and die.

Thank you for buying the new Tritonboy! This retro console comes with the new Nice Dice Twice!! game preloaded and ready to play. Enjoy its beautiful 8-bit styling, amazing 16 colours and top quality mono surround sound.

Controls

W,A,S,D press the console's crosshead. Direction arrows in the keyboard press action buttons.

Movement: W,A,S,D.

Shoot: Right arrow (→).

Menu navigation: 

  • Next screen: Right arrow (→).
  • Card / dice navigation: A,D.
  • Select and use card: Right arrow (→).
  • Card info: Left arrow (←).
  • Start new round: Enter

Pause: Escape.

Music & SFX
